comments.author: 2003-webmaster@web.de
comments.creator: 2003-webmaster@web.de
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; de; rv:1.9.2.15) Gecko/20110303 Firefox/3.6.15
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; de; rv:1.9.2.15) Gecko/20110303 Firefox/3.6.15

After a Download from Softonic.com, i opened the Dowloadmanager from Firefox.
so i found this error message:

XML-Verarbeitungsfehler: Ungeschlossenes Token
Adresse: chrome://mozapps/content/downloads/downloads.xul
Zeile Nr. 83, Spalte 5:    <menuitem id="menuitem_show"


Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. file download opened (save file)
2. downloading file
3. open download manager 
4. (looks like error since last update)
